title: The Home buyers' bible
brief_description: Don’t be trapped when buying a home. Designed to prepare you for what will quite possibly be the most important purchase of your life. It prepares you with the information needed to protect yourself from problems whan buying a home, whilst also supplying information about what to do and where to go should you encounter difficulties after purchasing a home.
